attachments.title: Portland Has The Best Sour Beer in America, According to the New York Times
attachments.text: Stop the presses: It turns out the New York Times loves something in Portland, Portland makes good beer, and Cascade ain’t half-bad at making sour beer. After tasting 20 different sour, wild and farmhouse beers from all over the country, famed wine critic Eric Asimov just declared that the 2014 kriek from Portland’s Cascade Barrel House—a sour … Continue reading Portland Has The Best Sour Beer in America, According to the New York Times
